title: ICSI CS Professional and Executive June 2026 Exam Enrollment Begins Today!
content:
# ICSI CS Professional and Executive June 2026 Exam Enrollment Begins Today!

Ek important update hai Company Secretary aspirants ke liye! The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) ne CS Professional aur Executive June 2026 exams ke liye online enrollment process announce kiya hai.

Here are the key details you need to know:

*   **Online Enrollment Starts:** February 26, 2026.
*   **Last Date for Enrollment (Without Late Fee):** Candidates can enroll for the June 2026 exam without a late fee until March 25, 2026.
*   **June 2026 Exam Dates:** The CS Professional and Executive Programme examinations for the June 2026 session will be conducted from June 1 to June 7, 2026, in morning sessions.
*   **Eligibility:** This enrollment window is for candidates who have already registered for the CS Executive or Professional Programme for the June 2026 session. Please note, the last date for registration (not enrollment) for both modules was November 30, 2025, and for a single module, it was January 31, 2026.

Toh, jaldi se apna enrollment complete kar lo to avoid any last-minute hassle!

## Read the Official Document
*   [Visit the Official ICSI Website for Notifications and Updates](https://www.icsi.edu)

*Published on: 26 February 2026*
